actor_awards.notes: Also a successful director, composer, and artist.

filmography.title: Sadie Thompson
filmography.role_description: A fanatical, self-righteous moralist who tries to redeem a 'fallen woman' but succumbs to his own hypocrisy.
filmography.plot: A woman with a questionable past arrives on a South Sea island and clashes with a zealous reformer who wants to save her soul.

filmography.title: The Mysterious Island
filmography.role_description: A scientist and inventor who builds a submarine and discovers an underwater civilization in this early Technicolor adventure.
filmography.plot: A nobleman builds a submarine to explore the ocean depths and discovers a race of gill-men.

filmography.title: A Free Soul
filmography.role_description: A brilliant but alcoholic defense attorney who delivers a powerful courtroom monologue to save his daughter's ex-lover; the role won him the Oscar.
filmography.plot: A hard-drinking lawyer successfully defends a gangster on a murder charge, only to find his daughter falling for the criminal.

filmography.title: Mata Hari
filmography.role_description: A Russian general who becomes infatuated with the spy Mata Hari, leading to his downfall.
filmography.plot: During World War I, an exotic dancer moonlights as a spy for Germany, engaging in a dangerous game of espionage and romance.

filmography.title: Grand Hotel
filmography.role_description: A meek, terminally ill bookkeeper who decides to spend his life savings on one final, luxurious fling.
filmography.plot: A group of very different people staying at a luxurious Berlin hotel deal with their respective dramas over the course of a single day.

filmography.title: Rasputin and the Empress
filmography.role_description: The mad monk who wields hypnotic power over the Russian Imperial family; the only film to feature all three Barrymore siblings.
filmography.plot: The story of the Russian royal family's fall and the manipulative monk Rasputin who contributed to their demise.

filmography.title: Dinner at Eight
filmography.role_description: A shipping magnate facing financial ruin and health problems while trying to host a high-society dinner party.
filmography.plot: A high-society dinner party highlights the dramas, loves, and financial struggles of its eccentric guests.

filmography.title: Treasure Island
filmography.role_description: The old, rum-soaked pirate who brings the treasure map to the Admiral Benbow Inn, setting the adventure in motion.
filmography.plot: Young Jim Hawkins gets involved with the buccaneer Long John Silver in search of buried treasure.

filmography.title: David Copperfield
filmography.role_description: A humble, kind-hearted fisherman who takes in the young David Copperfield and protects his family.
filmography.plot: A young man navigates life in Victorian England, encountering colorful characters and overcoming hardships.

filmography.title: Mark of the Vampire
filmography.role_description: An expert on the occult who helps a police inspector solve a murder disguised as a vampire attack.
filmography.plot: A police inspector sets an elaborate trap for a murderer using a troupe of actors posing as vampires.

filmography.title: The Little Colonel
filmography.role_description: A stubborn former Confederate colonel who is estranged from his daughter until his granddaughter (Shirley Temple) melts his heart.
filmography.plot: A young girl helps reunite her estranged grandfather and mother in the Reconstruction-era South.

filmography.title: Ah, Wilderness!
filmography.role_description: The kindly, wise father of a small-town family in this adaptation of Eugene O'Neill's play.
filmography.plot: A young man in a small town in 1906 experiences the pains of adolescence and first love.

filmography.title: The Devil-Doll
filmography.role_description: A wrongly convicted banker who escapes prison and uses a scientist's shrinking formula to exact revenge on his enemies.
filmography.plot: A fugitive disguises himself as an old woman and uses shrunken humans to get revenge on the partners who framed him.

filmography.title: Camille
filmography.role_description: The stern father who convinces a courtesan to leave his son to save the family's reputation.
filmography.plot: A courtesan falls in love with a young promise but leaves him to save his reputation, all while succumbing to tuberculosis.

filmography.title: The Gorgeous Hussy
filmography.role_description: A portrayal of the seventh U.S. President, depicting his friendship with an innkeeper's daughter.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a Washington innkeeper becomes a central figure in the Andrew Jackson administration, scandalizing society.

filmography.title: Captains Courageous
filmography.role_description: A seasoned, fair-minded fishing schooner captain who teaches a spoiled rich boy the value of hard work.
filmography.plot: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship is rescued by a fishing boat and made to earn his keep.

filmography.title: You Can't Take It With You
filmography.role_description: The eccentric, tax-dodging patriarch of a free-spirited family who champions happiness over money.
filmography.plot: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

filmography.title: Young Dr. Kildare
filmography.role_description: A gruff, wheelchair-bound mentor to a young intern, launching a popular film series he starred in for years.
filmography.plot: A young doctor chooses to intern at a large hospital under a brilliant but cantankerous diagnostician.

filmography.title: Test Pilot
filmography.role_description: The owner of an aircraft company and boss to Clark Gable's reckless pilot character.
filmography.plot: A daredevil test pilot marries a girl he meets on a forced landing, but his job puts a strain on their relationship.

filmography.title: On Borrowed Time
filmography.role_description: An elderly grandfather who traps Death in an apple tree to stay alive and protect his grandson.
filmography.plot: An old man tricks Death into climbing an apple tree, where he is stuck, preventing anyone on Earth from dying.

filmography.title: A Guy Named Joe
filmography.role_description: The celestial commanding officer who assigns a deceased pilot to be a guardian angel.
filmography.plot: A pilot kills himself in a crash and returns as a guardian angel to guide a young pilot through the war and in love.

filmography.title: The Valley of Decision
filmography.role_description: The crippled, bitter father of a housemaid who holds a grudge against the wealthy steel mill owners.
filmography.plot: A maid in a Pittsburgh steel family's home falls for the owner's son, bridging the gap between the workers and the owners.

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful Life
filmography.role_description: The greedy, heartless banker who seeks to control the town of Bedford Falls and destroy the Bailey Building and Loan.
filmography.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

filmography.title: Duel in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A tyrannical, wheelchair-bound cattle baron who opposes his son's relationship and fights the coming railroad.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman causes a rift between two brothers on a Texas ranch, leading to a violent and tragic conclusion.

filmography.title: Key Largo
filmography.role_description: The wheelchair-bound proprietor of a hotel in the Florida Keys who stands up to a gangster holding them hostage.
filmography.plot: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

filmography.title: Down to the Sea in Ships
filmography.role_description: An old-school whaling captain who must teach his book-smart grandson the ways of the sea.
filmography.plot: A captain's grandson wants to be a whaler, but his grandfather wants him to study, leading to a conflict on the high seas.

filmography.title: Lone Star
filmography.role_description: Reprising his role as the former President, now aged, who supports the annexation of Texas.
filmography.plot: A cattle baron tasked with bringing Texas into the Union clashes with a senator and falls for a newspaper woman.
